name: Dark Tales 5: The Red Mask. Hidden Object Game.
name_original: Dark Tales 5: The Red Mask. Hidden Object Game.
description:
Crime has overrun the neighborhood as a mysterious stranger appears in a small French town. Streets have emptied and the townspeople all seem to be cheering for some Red Masque. Why would this be the case?

• TAKE UP THE LEADING PART IN THIS DETECTIVE THRILLER!
Justice is in your hands in this thrilling Hidden Object Adventure game! Explore a small French town experiencing a series of murders at the hand of a masked man.

• UNCOVER THE ORIGINS OF THE RED MASQUE
He’s been stalking the streets and murdering city officials. The mayor has called you in to help track him down and stop him!

• WHO IS THE REAL CRIMINAL?
Unlock this Collector's Edition to play the bonus content and find their origin. Enjoy this marvelous interpretation of a famous story by Edgar Allan Poe.



The READ_PHONE_STATE permission is used to generate unique hash of a device. No private data is being stored anywhere.
